name: EeveeSpotify unofficial repo
subtitle: Official Eevee releases
description:
Unofficial repository for EeveeSpotify and EeveeSpotifyRevived releases. Fetched from their official Telegram channels.
Credits to whoeevee and Skye, repo by titouan336 :)

apps.name: Spotify
apps.subtitle: Latest Eevee release
apps.localizedDescription: This tweak makes Spotify think you have a Premium subscription, granting free listening, just like Spotilife, and provides some additional features like custom lyrics.

versions.localizedDescription:
- updated spotify to v9.1.0
— one of the most popular music streaming services!
- EeveeSpotify v6.2.2 included
- OpenSpotifySafariExtension included

- updated spotify to v9.0.48
— one of the most popular music streaming services!
- EeveeSpotify v5.9.9 included
- OpenSpotifySafariExtension included

• Updated Polish localization by @yaptx

apps.name: Spotify (Patched)
apps.subtitle: Patched for paid certs
apps.localizedDescription:
Using the patched IPA should fix any widgets issues had when sideloading with paid certs (with app groups entitlement). this fix does not work with free sideloading methods such as AltStore/Sideloadly, and TrollStore users do not need to use a patched IPA.

further note: this IPA should be considered a beta test for now, so general support will not be provided for it.

versions.localizedDescription:

apps.name: Spotify (Revived)
apps.subtitle: No custom lyrics support
apps.localizedDescription:
Warning : This tweak does not support custom lyrics at this time.
Use original EeveeSpotify 9.1.0 for working lyrics.

This tweak makes Spotify think you have a Premium subscription, granting free listening, just like Spotilife, and provides some additional features like custom lyrics.

versions.localizedDescription:
- Spotify v9.1.6
- Re added setting menu
- Eevee Spotify v6.4.5 included
- OpenSpotifySafariExtension included

apps.name: Spotify (Revived, Patched)
apps.subtitle: No custom lyrics support
apps.localizedDescription:
Warning : This tweak does not support custom lyrics at this time.
Use original EeveeSpotify 9.1.0 for working lyrics.

Using the patched IPA should fix any widgets issues had when sideloading with paid certs (with app groups entitlement). this fix does not work with free sideloading methods such as AltStore/Sideloadly, and TrollStore users do not need to use a patched IPA.

further note: this IPA should be considered a beta test for now, so general support will not be provided for it.

versions.localizedDescription:
- Spotify v9.1.6
- Re added setting menu
- Eevee Spotify v6.4.5 included
- OpenSpotifySafariExtension included

news.title: EeveeSpotify is now Discontinued
news.caption:
On December 26, 2025, the developer whoeevee announced that EeveeSpotify was officially discontinued via a message on his Telegram channel.

Don't worry, the project has been continued by Skye, another developer, but currently, it does not support custom lyrics.

More information on the AltStore repo GitHub page.
